sentences.english: The cake maker shakes a naked snake with the qusimilarg rake without sake.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕製造者無緣無故地用寒戰的耙子擺一條赤裸的蛇。

sentences.english: A gloomy chill traversed Marius' heart.
sentences.chinese: 馬呂斯心裏憂鬱地打了一個寒戰。

sentences.english: A trickle of moisture ran down his spine and made him shudder.
sentences.chinese: 一滴水自他的脊背留下讓他打了個寒戰。

sentences.english: Fever, chills, rapid pulse and severe toxemia develop.
sentences.chinese: 這種病是發燒和寒戰交替發生的。

sentences.english: He felt very cold, he was shaking uncontrollably, his teeth were chattering.
sentences.chinese: 壁毯還不過是在風中晃動，他則是在大打寒戰。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the causes of post C-sect algor and the nursing countermeasures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討剖宮產產婦術後寒戰的原因及護理對策。

sentences.english: After seeing the result, the boy was trembled in the bloomy spring days.
sentences.chinese: 春暖花開的日子裏，孩子竟忍不住打了一個寒戰。

sentences.english: It is so cold that I keep shivering.
sentences.chinese: 天兒太冷了，我直打寒戰。

sentences.english: I shivered and pulled my scarf more tightly round my neck .
sentences.chinese: 我打了個寒戰，用圍巾把脖子圍得更緊了。

sentences.english: Conclusion Prophylactic low-dose of ketamine is effective in preventing postoperative shivering.
sentences.chinese: 結論預防性用小劑量的氯胺酮可有效預防術後寒戰。

definition: audition/dress rehearsal/preview (of a theatrical performance)/dummy run
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
Danny Lee Sau-Yin (1953-), Hong Kong actor and director
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
golden branch, jade leaves (idiom); fig. blue-blooded nobility, esp. imperial kinsmen or peerless beauty
